name: Amulet of the seven souls
description:
Cool classic JRPG with a more adult storyline. Use magic to protect and damage, pump weapons and knowledge. Only cunning and determination will allow you to defeat all the monsters of girls. After each battle, the monster can be "punished".

A mercenary bankrupt, on a doubtful scam, does not know how to make ends meet. He owes a huge amount of money and he has no way to pay it off. And then, by the will of fate, he is given a chance for a suicidal mission that will help solve all his problems.

Solve the riddles 3 in a row, choosing the right crystals, you get the magic or force of impact, each time the choice of the crystal completes your move. You can use magic and strike in one move. Each killing of the enemy, gives money for which you can buy new weapons, magic or learn secret knowledge.

Clear the valley of the monsters of girls and punish them.
